description: Semantic search index for Nate/Alma doctrine bible. Maps every post to searchable concepts, tokens, post-type, and semantic clusters so an agent can locate teachings by intent.

volatility-greeks.description: Options Greeks, implied/realized vol, skew, vanna, vomma, gamma, charm, veta, speed profile, butterfly spreads

macro-rates-fed.description: FOMC, Fed policy, Powell, CPI, PPI, PCE, GDP, inflation, yields, rate cuts, quantitative tightening, stagflation, debt ceiling, Treasury bills

opex-flows-positioning.description: Options expiration, VIX expiry, dealer positioning, gamma exposure, CTA flows, buyback, OpEx mechanics, net gamma, customer positioning, CBOE data

geopolitics-policy.description: China-US trade war, tariffs, Iran military risk, Russia-Ukraine, Board of Peace, Greenland, Ramadan, oil prices, bipolar world, Christian-nationalist ideology, Middle East, Venezuela

risk-framework.description: Window of Risk, left-tail/right-tail, kurtosis, VaR, Sharpe, Sortino, beta, mean reversion, risk premia, crowded trades, liquidity vacuum

ai-bubble-crypto.description: AI bubble, tech valuation, NVDA, capex spending, Bitcoin 5-year outlook, bubble burst triggers, passive flows, dispersion

educational-foundations.description: Reflexivity theory, Soros lecture, furu vs analyst, daily post reading guide, trading principles, statistical arbitrage, probability distributions, skew trading, Python quant course

performance-community.description: Performance reviews, year-end reflections, prediction accuracy, subscriber community, testimonials, model track record

spot-decay-liquidity.description: Spot decay mechanics, liquidity structure, insider speculation, negative wealth effect, hidden QE, rangebounding, oscillation with negative drift

carry-trade-fx.description: Yen carry trade, USDJPY, BoJ rate decisions, dedollarization, dollar/gold correlation, crack spread, Brent, gasoil

documents.title: Theory of Reflexivity by George Soros
documents.excerpt: Semi-transcript of Soros 2009 CEU Budapest lecture on fallibility, reflexivity, and human uncertainty principle. Markets always distort underlying fundamentals. EMH vs reflexivity. Super-bubbles. Applies to understanding why volatility cycles need narratives.

documents.title: Educational thread (chat)
documents.excerpt: Quick explanation of realized/implied volatility, probability distributions, skew trading. Chat-format educational post.

documents.title: What's the Difference Between a Furu and an Analyst? (with book recommendations)
documents.excerpt: Distinguishes market 'gurus' from real analysts. Book recommendations. Fraud in financial media. Why laypeople gravitate to simple predictions vs complex analysis.

documents.title: Articles - Predictions, Education
documents.excerpt: Index post linking major articles: challenges of 2026, AI/tech bubble burst warnings, liquidity structure, gamma-derivative speed profile framework for intraday trading.

documents.title: Iran-risk and oil prices
documents.excerpt: Trump missed Iran military window. Ramadan constraint. Crack spread at 95th percentile. Brent call demand surging. Geopolitical risk assessment of military strike consequences.

documents.title: A year is over...
documents.excerpt: Year-end reflection. 2,494 subscribers. Called February top, geopolitical shifts. Community of market makers, fund managers, retail traders united by curiosity and humility.

documents.title: April's performance review
documents.excerpt: Defense of macro analysis approach. 'Short run voting machine, long run weighing machine' (Graham). Volatility cycles need narratives. Market is about valuing things.

documents.title: Board of Peace, Greenland, Hidden Left-tail and Kurtosis | Geopolitical Developments
documents.excerpt: Trump's 'Board of Peace' UN replacement at Davos. Absolutist arrangements masquerading as constitutional. Christian-nationalist ideology push. Hidden left-tail risk in geopolitical architecture collapse.

documents.title: Earning season, Micro and Macro flows, Carry trade & Geopolitic landscape | Quant Insights - January 2026
documents.excerpt: Comprehensive macro report. BoJ rate decision impact on carry trade. Japan gilt-crisis parallel to UK 2022. Volatility-control funds at 95-98% equity exposure (parallels 1987 portfolio insurance). Institutional flow analysis.

documents.title: [free] SPX, Gold, BTC - A quick overview of the recent momentum and sentiment
documents.excerpt: SPX testing November lows. 10% decline below 6200 would be healthy. Gold temporal retest of lows. Dollar/gold correlation shift. BTC correlation with equities.

documents.title: Window of Risk Pt. 2 - Flows update
documents.excerpt: Comprehensive Window of Risk framework. Prior WoR calls: Feb-April, May correction, July/August window. All played out. Market running on passive flows, short-vol crowded, valuation metrics 'on the moon'.

documents.title: Python course
documents.excerpt: Python course by Jason Strimpel (20+ years quant, $20B credit exposure). 19 hours: core Python, Pandas, QuantLib derivatives pricing, Riskfolio portfolio optimization. 41 lessons, lifetime access.

documents.title: Failed payments
documents.excerpt: Administrative post about Stripe payment issues and customer support contacts. Monthly subscription recommended at $35/month.

documents.title: A Guide to Reading My Daily Posts
documents.excerpt: How to read Alma's daily posts. 4 components: premarket heatmap, script inputs (levels with probabilities), speed profile description, vanna flip/speed slip. Reverse-engineering market structure.

documents.title: Above the line..., China vs US - Intraday post (25/April)
documents.excerpt: Witkoff in Kremlin. Major General assassination in Balashikha. Trump ceasefire timeline: May 9 target. Pope funeral in Rome for bilateral talks. Saudi $100B+ arms deal. China lying about trade talks.

documents.title: Accumulating risk - Intraday post (16/Oct)
documents.excerpt: Geo risks not properly priced. HY OAS at 3.1%, MOVE mid-70s. Venezuela escalation. Institutions accumulating puts against retail short-vol crowding. Market headline sensitive.

documents.title: After FOMC and US-UAE deal, Intraday post (08/May)
documents.excerpt: Post-FOMC analysis. Hidden QE via Treasury bill issuance reducing long-end supply. 'Crash mats' built by selling OTM puts. 60% odds of July cut. 2s10s steepening opportunity.

documents.title: After NFP, Fed, Weekly post (05-09/May)
documents.excerpt: Post-NFP 177K jobs. Tariff policy credibility analysis. Sino-Russian alliance constraining US options. Taiwan risk acceleration. Victory Day timeline. Limit-order hunting dynamics.

documents.title: After the opEx + Intraday post (21/July)
documents.excerpt: Post-OpEx buyback flow predicted. SPX at 6313. Structural pivot at 6321.75 ES / 6281.89 SPX. Market ranging 2 weeks before FOMC risk target.

documents.title: Ahead of datas, Short-term positioning shift, Risk/reward shift + Intraday post (02/July)
documents.excerpt: Powell at ECB conference reaffirms data dependency. Short fly spread at 6000/6070/6145. Complex Greeks analysis: short vega/vomma/charm, long veta/vanna/theta/delta. Risk/reward shift framework.

documents.title: Ahead of FOMC, Intraday post (05/May)
documents.excerpt: Section 232 semiconductor probe. 25-100% chip tariffs imminent. Only 10 comments filed vs 300 for prior probes. Growth-shock + Fed decision collision. Sell into strength recommendation.

documents.title: Appendix for today's intraday post
documents.excerpt: Four key statements: low/negative gamma, realized vol bid vs implied underperformance, JHEQX collar put strike, skew stagnant despite bearishness. Spot decay = hedged grind lower to make tech attractive for ME investors.

documents.title: GDP Release - Weekly post (22-26/Dec)
documents.excerpt: GDP release analysis. Liquidity vacuum below market. Weekly POC at 6810. GDPNow at 3.5% vs 3.2% consensus. SPX/yields beta analysis for inflation scare scenarios. 'Goldilocks' case framework.

documents.title: Intraday post 19/march (+Fed)
documents.excerpt: US struggling with stagflation. Trump trying to eradicate on paper. Hawkish cut was populist. Fed QT runoff mechanics. Debt ceiling risk to reserve levels. Renaissance losses, Citadel MM profits.

documents.title: Intraday post (28/Aug)
documents.excerpt: Detailed intraday speed profile coding. Short fly pattern with net negative speed. Centroid 6466-6472. Gamma magnetic at 6493. Power hour pin analysis. Exact pivot, confirmation, and target levels.

documents.title: Intraday post (28/feb)
documents.excerpt: Detailed gamma coding for expo day. Zero vanna at 5914, downside flip at 5795.65. Negative speed environment. Short color (negative charm convexity). Spot decay pattern explanation from '22/'23.

documents.title: January OpEx week quant breakdown | Weekly post (12-16/Jan) - FREE
documents.excerpt: January OpEx breakdown. Dice loaded, game rigged, pain trade up. Short vol front-end, long straddles long-end. Deep OTM TLT puts. Q2 first serious shake expected. Shock factor rising.

documents.title: OpEx, Intraday post (20/march) + Fed path and tech (with geos)
documents.excerpt: FOMC: growth forecasts marked down to 1.7%, inflation revised up. QT slowed from $25B to $5B/month. SEP skewed toward weaker activity. Tariff inflation more persistent than expected. Powell dovish but underestimating risks.

documents.title: OpEx, VIXpery and PCE week | Weekly post (17-20/Feb)
documents.excerpt: Short week: FOMC minutes Wednesday, PCE+GDP Friday, VIX expo + monthly OpEx. Net gamma grew 44.56%. Reversion model red dot appeared. NASDAQ ranging since October FOMC. Sentiment shifting to 'good news is good news'.

documents.title: Post-FOMC | Intraday post (29/Jan)
documents.excerpt: Post-FOMC: structure shifting to globex as dedollarization continues. Powell didn't comment dollar. SPX speed profile net negative. Vol sold both directions, more downside protection. Gamma inflow +23%, volume -17%.

documents.title: Warsh, Gold, Sentiment | Weekly post (02-06/Feb)
documents.excerpt: Warsh nomination as Fed Chair. 'Front-end easing + back-end discipline' regime. Curve steepener, rising term premia. AI/productivity narrative needed. Druckenmiller-Duquesne network. Bubble burst approaching.

documents.title: Weekly post (09/feb - 14/feb)
documents.excerpt: Advanced: coded SPX skew into Feb 18 in 3D. IV rate-of-change measured across put/call segments. ATM vol +29% into Friday vs minimal wing movement. Traders hedging data but not expecting left-tail risk.

documents.title: Python course is launched | Weekly post (09-13/Feb)
documents.excerpt: Python course announced. NFP+CPI data week. Tech growth unsustainable â€” bubble bursts when market recognizes demand is infrastructure-built. ES pivots at 7005 and 6960/70. Shock factor rising.

documents.title: 3 latest weekly posts have been set free
documents.excerpt: 3 weekly posts set free showing prediction accuracy: volatile Feb 3, mid-week vol, Monday-Tuesday ranging + Wednesday melt-up + Friday snapback. Models derived from CBOE customer positioning data.
